question.title: Which of the following populations is NOT at risk of deficiency and/or malformation during pregnancy?
question.description: Select the option that is NOT a known risk factor

option_b.title: Restrictive or unbalanced diets
option_b.description: Eating habits that do not provide adequate nutrients

option_c.title: Twin pregnancies, closely-spaced pregnancies
option_c.description: Consecutive pregnancies with a short interval

option_d.title: History of neural tube defect or cleft lip and palate
